languages.text: "Ты — мог{mf||ла} бы. Домин и {mf|его|ее} тень связывает особая нить. Единая нить. Хватит ли этой связи, чтобы вступили ваши души в гармонию?"
"You could. A thread binds the Domin and {mf|his|her} shadow together. A rare thread, a shared thread. Will that connection be enough for your souls to enter into harmony?"
languages.original_text: "Ты — мог{mf||ла} бы. Домин и {mf|его|ее} тень связывает особая нить. Единая нить. Хватит ли этой связи, чтобы вступили ваши души в гармонию?"

traits.locale_text: "You could. A special thread binds the Enim and {mf|his|her} shadow together. A shared thread. Will that connection be enough for your souls to enter into harmony?"
"You could. A special thread binds the Enim and {mf|his|her} shadow together. A shared thread. Will that connection be enough for your souls to enter into harmony?"
"You could. A special thread binds the Enim and {mf|his|her} shadow together. A shared thread. Will that connection be enough for your souls to enter into harmony?"
"You could. A special thread binds the Enim and {mf|his|her} shadow together. A shared thread. Will that connection be enough for your souls to enter into harmony?"
"You could. A thread binds the Domin and {mf|his|her} shadow together. A rare thread, a shared thread. Will that connection be enough for your souls to enter into harmony?"
"You could. A thread binds the Domin and {mf|his|her} shadow together. A rare thread, a shared thread. Will that connection be enough for your souls to enter into harmony?"

languages.text: « Vous pourriez. {mf|Le|La} Domin et son ombre sont à jamais {mf|liés|liées}. Et le fil qu'{mf|ils|elles} partagent est rare. Mais cette connexion suffira-t-elle pour que vos âmes entrent en harmonie ? »
languages.original_text: "You could. A thread binds the Domin and {mf|his|her} shadow together. A rare thread, a shared thread. Will that connection be enough for your souls to enter into harmony?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous pourriez. {mf|Le|La} Domin et son ombre sont à jamais {mf|liés|liées}. Et le fil qu'{mf|ils|elles} partagent est rare. Mais cette connexion suffira-t-elle pour que vos âmes entrent en harmonie ? »

languages.text: «Usted podría. Hay un hilo que une a{mf|l| la} Domin y su sombra. Es un hilo singular y entrelazado. ¿Bastará esa conexión para que sus almas alcancen la armonía?».
languages.original_text: "You could. A thread binds the Domin and {mf|his|her} shadow together. A rare thread, a shared thread. Will that connection be enough for your souls to enter into harmony?"

traits.locale_text: «Usted podría. Hay un hilo que une a{mf|l| la} Domin y su sombra. Es un hilo singular y entrelazado. ¿Bastará esa conexión para que sus almas alcancen la armonía?».

languages.text: 「できます。糸がドミンと{mf|彼|彼女}の影を結びつけるのです。珍しい糸、分かち合いの糸。その繋がりは、あなた達の魂の調和に十分でしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "You could. A thread binds the Domin and {mf|his|her} shadow together. A rare thread, a shared thread. Will that connection be enough for your souls to enter into harmony?"

traits.locale_text: 「できます。糸がドミンと{mf|彼|彼女}の影を結びつけるのです。珍しい糸、分かち合いの糸。その繋がりは、あなた達の魂の調和に十分でしょうか？」

languages.text: “但您可以，秘者与{mf|他|她}的影子由丝线联结在一起，这条罕见的丝线由双方共有。这样的联结是否能让你们的灵魂同入和谐？”
languages.original_text: "You could. A thread binds the Domin and {mf|his|her} shadow together. A rare thread, a shared thread. Will that connection be enough for your souls to enter into harmony?"

traits.locale_text: “但您可以，秘者与{mf|他|她}的影子由丝线联结在一起，这条罕见的丝线由双方共有。这样的联结是否能让你们的灵魂同入和谐？”

languages.text: "Doch. Ein Faden verbindet den Domin und {mf|seinen|ihren} Schatten. Ein seltener Faden, ein gemeinsamer Faden. Wird diese Verbindung ausreichen, um Eure Seelen in Harmonie zu bringen?"
languages.original_text: "You could. A thread binds the Domin and {mf|his|her} shadow together. A rare thread, a shared thread. Will that connection be enough for your souls to enter into harmony?"

traits.locale_text: "Doch. Ein Faden verbindet den Domin und {mf|seinen|ihren} Schatten. Ein seltener Faden, ein gemeinsamer Faden. Wird diese Verbindung ausreichen, um Eure Seelen in Harmonie zu bringen?"

languages.text: "Siz yapabilirsiniz. Domin ile gölgesini birbirine bağlayan bir iplik... Nadir bir iplik olsa da paylaşılan bir iplik... Ruhlarınızın uyum sağlaması için böyle bir bağlantı yeterli olur mu?"
languages.original_text: "You could. A thread binds the Domin and {mf|his|her} shadow together. A rare thread, a shared thread. Will that connection be enough for your souls to enter into harmony?"
